## TransactableLiquity.stakeLQTY() method

Stake LQTY to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeLQTY(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base-u.decimalish.md) | Amount of LQTY to add to new or existing stake. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base-u.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out an existing LQTY stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base-u.lqtystake.collateralgain.md) and [LUSD gain](./lib-base-u.lqtystake.lusdgain.md)<!-- -->.
